cobblemon.species.turtwigpalms.name: Arecan Turtwig
cobblemon.species.turtwigpalms.desc1: Turtwig that live in the Areca Region have adapted to live in the oceans alongside many other marine Pok√©mon. Its leaves are sensitive to currents underwater.
cobblemon.species.grotlepalms.name: Arecan Grotle
cobblemon.species.grotlepalms.desc1: The tree on Grotle's back is still young, leading many Grotle to spend their time sunbathing on the shore. Arecan Grotle have a weaker bite than Grotle from Sinnoh.
cobblemon.species.torterrapalms.name: Arecan Torterra
cobblemon.species.torterrapalms.desc1: Its tree may slow it down, but Arecan Torterra reign supreme in the ocean despite it. Every once in a while, there are sightings of Torterra with shells that are over 7.5 meters long.
cobblemon.species.mankeypalms.name: Arecan Mankey
cobblemon.species.mankeypalms.desc1: This unique variant of the species resembles a living coconut, prone to sudden fits of rage, thrashing unpredictably. Legend holds that its coconuts carry echoes of ancient storms, resonating with the ocean's fury when provoked.
cobblemon.species.primeapepalms.name: Arecan Primeape
cobblemon.species.primeapepalms.desc1: Fueled by ceaseless fury within its tough coconut shell, this relentless creature remains in a perpetual state of agitation, its hardened coconut hands ever-ready for action in the tropical wilderness.
cobblemon.species.annihilapepalms.name: Arecan Annihilape
cobblemon.species.annihilapepalms.desc1: In the heart of the tropical wilderness, a wrathful specter encased in a lifeless coconut unleashes boundless power when its seething anger reaches its peak.
cobblemon.species.nosepasspalms.name: Arecan Nosepass
cobblemon.species.nosepasspalms.desc1: Arecan Nosepass no longer point towards the north pole, as they now bare a nose made out of a gem similar to emeralds and rubies. In ancient times, they enjoyed roaming around small villages with an established economy.
cobblemon.species.probopasspalms.name: Arecan Probopass
cobblemon.species.probopasspalms.desc1: While it's gems are highly valued, it's floating mini heads watch all around itself. It is unknown how Arecan Probopass pierces it's nose rings despite not having hands.
